articles.description: Turning off traction control in the centre of London isn’t a great idea at the best of times, but when you’re driving a 588kW Ferrari 812 Superfast it's just asking for trouble. Footage posted to Y...
articles.content:
Here's why it's not a good idea to switch off traction control on a 588kW supercar in the city.
Turning off traction control in the centre of London isn’t a great idea at the best of times, but when… [+1241 chars]

articles.author: Chris Matyszczyk
articles.title: Samsung denigrates Apple by mocking Steve Jobs' thinking - ZDNet
articles.description: You think the Korean handset maker will just sit there as Apple inhales all the PR oxygen it can? Well, Samsung is back aggressively sniping at Apple.
articles.content:
A bigger idea? Or a little small?
Samsung
It can be frustrating being Samsung.
You come up with all these innovations, then Apple copies them as if they'd never heard of Samsung.
Not too long ago… [+2828 chars]

articles.title: WIN A PlayStation 5 Console - Press Start Australia
articles.description: A PlayStation 5 competition where you can win a PS5 in time for Christmas. The winner will walk away with a brand new PS5.
articles.content: To celebrate the launch of the PlayStation 5, we’ve got one console to give away to one lucky reader. All you have to do is fill in the below form to go into the running. We want to know what excites… [+705 chars]
